newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia DRB-Hicom group to hold news conference.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia DRB-Hicom group to hold news conference.

text.p: DRB-Hicom Group said it expects to hold a news conference on Thursday, March 6.
The group was headed by Yahaya Ahmad, who died in a helicopter crash on Monday. A company official said the news conference was scheduled for 5:30 p.m. local time (0930 GMT).

Details on the conference were not disclosed but the companies have been expected to name an interim successor to Yahaya, who was also chairman of national car maker Perusahaan Otomobil Nasional Bhd (Proton).
The shares of nine Yahaya-related companies were suspended on Tuesday at the companies requests.
